data.title: The Outward Urge by Wyndham (John) and Lucas Parkes [both pseuds. for John Wyndham Parkes Lucas Beynon Harris].: Very Good Hardcover (1959) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - Michael Joseph, London - 1959 - Condition: Very Good - Dust Jacket Included - First edition. 8vo. Original black cloth lettered in white. Dust-jacket, correctly priced 13s6d. Conventional science fiction from the pen of Wyndham, comprising four chapters - a fifth chapter was added to subsequent editions. A fine copy, in slightly chipped but otherwise very good dust-jacket. - The Outward Urge
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Books will be shipped upon receipt of full cleared payment. Pay via credit card, Paypal or Cheque (£, sterling only).

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 3 business days. Shipping costs are based upon the parcel weighing approx 850g. Books worth more than £75 will be shipped via special delivery in the U.K. and by Royal Mails International Signed for service to all international destinations.
